Bash("D:\BIGBOSS\claudecode\venv\Scripts\python.exe" -c "
import os
import csv

data_dir = os.path.join(os.path.dirname(__file__), ''..'', ''data'')
csv_file = None
for file in os.listdir(data_dir):
    if file.endswith(''.csv''):
        csv_file = os.path.join(data_dir, file)
        break

if csv_file:
    with open(csv_file, ''r'') as f:
        reader = csv.reader(f)
        rows = list(reader)
        print(f''总行数: {len(rows)}'')
        print(f''数据行数: {len(rows) - 1}'')  # 减去标题行
else:
    print(''未找到CSV文件'')
")

Bash("D:\BIGBOSS\claudecode\venv\Scripts\python" -c "
import os
import csv

data_dir = os.path.join(os.path.dirname(__file__), ''..'', ''data'')
csv_file = None
for file in os.listdir(data_dir):
    if file.endswith(''.csv''):
        csv_file = os.path.join(data_dir, file)
        break

if csv_file:
    with open(csv_file, ''r'') as f:
        reader = csv.reader(f)
        rows = list(reader)
        print(f''总行数: {len(rows)}'')
        print(f''数据行数: {len(rows) - 1}'')  # 减去标题行
        print(f''文件路径: {csv_file}'')
        print(f''前5行数据:'')
        for i, row in enumerate(rows[:5]):
            print(f''  行{i+1}: {row}'')
else:
    print(''未找到CSV文件'')
")
